message: Hi Bob, let's split the money evenly.
I'd like a bit more, 60-40 seems fair to me.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  55/45 is a good compromise.
I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, 58-42 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. 52/48 is my final offer.
I'll try again, 57-43 is a good split, don't let the money go to waste.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but we're running out of time. 51/49 is my last offer.
